panels.description:
Quickly spot

(a) how much has been processed,
(b) is the feed good, and
(c) has the service restarted.
panels.title: Events (total)

panels.description:
Quickly spot

(a) how much has been processed,
(b) is the feed good, and
(c) has the service restarted.
panels.title: Events (frequency)

panels.description:
Represented as a 1-way latency.

Can be measured as

(a) half the time to receive a reply to a heartbeat request, or
(b) the difference between current time and a timestamp originated from the exchange.
panels.title: External (latency)
